channel.title: WTF!? rep++ PI
channel.description:
Basically when I go into the wilderness and attack someone;
Headicons stop working I can't see the chat (only in chatbox, not above head) Can't see hitmarks or hp bar
Then some how it automatically fixes itself (after like 30 minutes or something, can't confirm it fixes itself yet) or something and it works again, but then if I go wildy and attack someone again same thing happens. So weird, will rep++ for help.
No compiling errors, or running errors (server and client).
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/845/81767293.jpg/][IMG]http://img845.imageshack.us/img845/5656/81767293.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/202/sgds.jpg/][IMG]http://img202.imageshack.us/img202/6238/sgds.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/84/wtfsn.jpg/][IMG]http://img84.imageshack.us/img84/6161/wtfsn.jpg[/img][/URL]

item.title: WTF!? rep++ PI
item.dc:creator: @ForeverPkers ForeverPkers
item.description:
@ForeverPkers wrote:

I’m sorry to post without an answer, but if you are using a client with a different source than the client that the source came with, sometimes you have to edit the headicon thing in player.java. I forgot what you have to do but I’ve had to do it sometimes. That might be your problem, it might not, but I’m sure there’s an answer in the code that you have for combat

Read full topic
